docs.text: Quick Start Welcome to quick start documentation. Api's To acess the terminal for interative tests for the api's, enter in the api root Environment Api Documentation Accessing the EndPoints All endpoints avaiable are listed in server When entering in this url, all endpoints will be listed. Note You need toe loged in to use the API's Example: 1. To login access the admin page username: your username. password: your password. enter at server and it's done. Start to use the api!

docs.text: Environment API Documentation Returns all environment from a registered account. graph TD; https://server/api/env/-->GET/; https://server/api/env/-->GET/uuid; https://server/api/env/-->POST/; https://server/api/env/-->DELETE/; Get endpoint: /env/ Returns Environments registered on the database. Parameters No parameters. Responses Code Description 200 Success 400 Bad Request 401 Not Authorized Example: GET http://server/api/env/ Response 200 ok [ {"uuid": "string"} {"uuid": "string"} {"uuid": "string"} ] Consuming the API Enter in the url http://server/api/env/ Click on GET button at the top right side of the screen Make sure you are logged in. endpoint: /env/{uuid} Returns Environments registered on the database. Parameters Parameter In Description uuid *required path Environment identifier Responses Code Description 200 Success 400 Bad Request 401 Not Authorized Example: GET http://server/api/env/uuid 200 ok { "transp_cost": [ [ [ 8.504379284263033, 8.21952272694995, 7.335616371598338 ], [ 9.188171808943858, 6.399709100195715, 8.465899755878109 ], [ 5.043810632924408, 9.30498145274223, 5.543619294516228 ] ], [ [ 8.273912408515342, 5.219330242553533, 6.965109393725479 ], [ 6.843241536238311, 8.861599481023948, 5.229627303652337 ], [ 5.757278568029695, 9.556365124630641, 5.645263721660658 ] ] ], "prod_cost": [ [ 2.6673777707712727, 2.019097743991032, 3.9197012389507133 ], [ 4.028668653602703, 4.930122930206867, 2.669597812493785 ] ], "fixed_cost": [ 17.61564249593163, 13.014259072860215, 19.19574948645142 ], "demand": [ [ 24, 17, 24 ], [ 14, 24, 10 ] ], "supply": [ [ 29.0, 25.0, 26.0 ], [ 21.0, 21.0, 19.0 ] ], "space": [ 1.0127012901645935, 1.1174345954454479 ], "flow_cap": [ [ 25.0, 26.0, 27.0 ], [ 25.0, 23.0, 25.0 ], [ 22.0, 24.0, 20.0 ] ], "uuid": "01f4481f-cd64-45af-b443-9c3ea791c3e3", "p_tuple": [ 2.0, 5.0 ], "i_tuple": [ 2.0, 5.0 ], "j_tuple": [ 2.0, 5.0 ], "tc_tuple": [ 5.0, 10.0 ], "pc_tuple": [ 2.0, 5.0 ], "fc_tuple": [ 10.0, 20.0 ], "demand_tuple": [ 10.0, 25.0 ], "space_tuple": [ 0.25, 1.5 ], "num_p": 2, "num_i": 2, "num_j": 4 } Consuming the API Enter in the url http://server/api/env/uuid , where uuid was provided by the previous step. Make sure you are logged in. Warning Note that iuuid is invalid, bad request will return.
docs.title: Environment API Documentation
